K10D0109_H0112:462a-1: a'ar+ya ga y'a shirsha n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /

K10D0109_H0112:468a-16: shes rab ni bral ba shes pa'o //
K10D0109_H0112:468a-17: thabs ni rgyu la dmigs pa shes pa'o //
K10D0109_H0112:468a-18: shes rab ni rgyu zad par 'gro ba'o //
K10D0109_H0112:468a-19: thabs ni chos tha dag pa shes pa'o //
K10D0109_H0112:468a-20: shes rab ni chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes pa'o //
K10D0109_H0112:468a-21: thabs ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan shes pa'o //
K10D0109_H0112:468a-22: shes rab ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam pa nyid dbyer med par shes pa'o //
K10D0109_H0112:468a-23: thabs ni sems can gyi dbang po dang spyod pa la 'jug pa shes pa'o //
K10D0109_H0112:468a-24: shes rab ni sems can dmigs su med par shes pa'o //
K10D0109_H0112:468a-25: thabs ni byang chub kyi rgyan thob par byed pa shes pa'o //
K10D0109_H0112:468b-0: shes rab ni sangs rgyas kyi @468b chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa shes pa'o //
K10D0109_H0112:468b-2: gzhan yang mdor bsdus pa'i lam gnyis te /
K10D0109_H0112:468b-5: yongs su gcod pa'i lam mo //
K10D0109_H0112:468b-6: de la tshogs kyi lam ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag go /
K10D0109_H0112:468b-7: yongs su gcod pa'i lam ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K10D0109_H0112:468b-8: gzhan yang mdor bsdus pa'i lam gnyis te /
K10D0109_H0112:468b-10: chags pa dang bcas pa'i lam dang /
K10D0109_H0112:468b-11: chags pa med pa'i lam mo //
K10D0109_H0112:468b-12: de la chags pa dang bcas pa'i lam ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag go /
K10D0109_H0112:468b-13: chags pa med pa'i lam ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K10D0109_H0112:468b-14: gzhan yang mdor bsdus pa'i lam gnyis te /
K10D0109_H0112:468b-16: zag pa dang bcas pa'i lam dang /
K10D0109_H0112:468b-17: zag pa med pa'i lam mo //
K10D0109_H0112:468b-18: de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i lam ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag go /
K10D0109_H0112:468b-19: zag pa med pa'i lam ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K10D0109_H0112:468b-20: gzhan yang mdor bsdus pa'i lam gnyis te /
K10D0109_H0112:468b-22: tshad yod par byas pa'i lam dang /
K10D0109_H0112:468b-23: tshad med par byas pa'i lam mo //
K10D0109_H0112:468b-24: de la tshad yod par byas pa'i lam ni mtshan ma'i gnas so //
K10D0109_H0112:468b-25: tshad med par byas pa'i lam ni mtshan ma med pa'i gnas so //
K10D0109_H0112:469a-0: gzhan yang mdor bsdus pa'i lam gnyis @469a *//
K10D0109_H0112:469a-4: de la shes pa'i lam ni sa dang po nas bzung ste sa bdun pa'i bar du'o //
K10D0109_H0112:469a-5: spong ba'i lam ni sa brgyad pa nas bzung ste sa bcu pa'i bar du'o //
K10D0109_H0112:469a-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K10D0109_H0112:469a-7: ye shes sgrub pa dpa' bos 'jam dpal gzhon nur
K10D0109_H0112:469a-8: gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0109_H0112:469a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na don gyis rab tu phye ba yin /
K10D0109_H0112:469a-11: ji ltar na ye shes kyis rab tu phye ba yin /
K10D0109_H0112:469a-14: don ni ldan pa med pa'o //
K10D0109_H0112:469a-18: ci'i phyir don ni ldan pa med la ye shes ni ldan pa yin /
K10D0109_H0112:469a-21: don ni 'dus ma byas pa ste /
K10D0109_H0112:469a-22: chos gang dang yang ldan pa'am mi ldan pa ma yin par khong du chud par bya'o //
K10D0109_H0112:469a-24: don ni 'gyur ba med pa'i mtshan nyid yin te /
K10D0109_H0112:469a-25: de ni chos gang dang ldan pa'am /
K10D0109_H0112:469a-26: mi ldan pa ma yin par khong du chud par bya'o //
K10D0109_H0112:469a-27: don ni gzod ma nas yongs su grub pa med
K10D0109_H0112:469a-28: pa'i phyir chos gang dang yang ldan pa'am mi ldan
K10D0109_H0112:469b-0: pa ma yin par khong @469b du chud par bya'o
K10D0109_H0112:469b-1: // don ni dor ba med pa dang gzhag pa
K10D0109_H0112:469b-2: med pa'i phyir chos gang dang yang ldan pa'am mi
K10D0109_H0112:469b-3: ldan pa ma yin par khong du chud par bya'o
K10D0109_H0112:469b-4: // // ye shes zhes bya ba ni lam ste /
K10D0109_H0112:469b-5: lam ni sems dang yang dag par ldan pa yin gyi mi ldan pa ma yin te /
K10D0109_H0112:469b-7: de'i phyir ye shes ni ldan pa zhes bya ste /
K10D0109_H0112:469b-8: mi ldan pa ma yin no //
K10D0109_H0112:469b-9: ye shes ni spong ba dang yang dag par ldan pa yin gyi mi ldan pa yin te /
K10D0109_H0112:469b-11: de'i phyir ye shes ni ldan pa zhes bya ste /
K10D0109_H0112:469b-12: mi ldan pa ma yin no //
K10D0109_H0112:469b-13: ye shes zhes bya ba ni phung po la mkhas pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:469b-15: skye mched la mkhas pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:469b-16: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:469b-17: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rnam par dpyad pa la mkhas pa ste /
K10D0109_H0112:469b-19: de'i phyir ye shes ni ldan pa zhes bya ste /
K10D0109_H0112:469b-20: mi ldan pa ma yin no //

K10D0109_H0112:469b-23: rnam pa bcu gang zhe na /
K10D0109_H0112:469b-31: pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:469b-32: snying rje chen po shes pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:469b-33: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:469b-34: chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med par shes pa ste /
K10D0109_H0112:470a-1: rnam pa de bcu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes pa'o //
K10D0109_H0112:470a-3: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rtsom pa rnam pa bcu ste /
K10D0109_H0112:470a-4: rnam pa bcu gang zhe na /
K10D0109_H0112:470a-6: sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi las yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir lus kyi rtsom pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:470a-7: sems can thams cad kyi ngag gi las yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir ngag gi rtsom pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:470a-8: sems can thams cad kyi yid kyi las yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir sems kyi rtsom pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:470a-9: sems can thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med par bya ba'i phyir nang gi rtsom pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:470a-10: sems can thams cad la mtshungs par sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir phyi'i rtsom pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:470a-11: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ye shes kyi rtsom pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:470a-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan bkod
K10D0109_H0112:470a-13: pa kun tu bstan pa'i phyir zhing gi rtsom pa
K10D0109_H0112:470a-14: dang / nyon mongs pa'i nad kyi sman yongs su
K10D0109_H0112:470a-15: shes par bya ba'i phyir sems can yongs su smin
K10D0109_H0112:470a-16: par bya ba'i rtsom pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:470a-17: nges pa'i phung po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir de kho na'i rtsom pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:470a-18: khams gsum pa thams cad la sems mngon par zhen
K10D0109_H0112:470a-19: pa med par bya ba'i phyir 'dus ma byas kyi
K10D0109_H0112:470b-0: ye shes @470b yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i rtsom
K10D0109_H0112:470b-2: rnam pa 'di bcu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rtsom pa'o //

K10D0109_H0112:470b-7: pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyor ba dang /
K10D0109_H0112:470b-8: bsdu ba'i dngos po'i sbyor ba dang /
K10D0109_H0112:470b-9: shes rab kyi sbyor ba dang /
K10D0109_H0112:470b-11: snying rje chen po'i sbyor ba dang /
K10D0109_H0112:470b-12: bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su 'tshol ba'i sbyor ba dang /
K10D0109_H0112:470b-13: ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su 'tshol ba'i sbyor ba dang /
K10D0109_H0112:470b-14: bsam pa rnam par sbyong ba'i sbyor ba dang /
K10D0109_H0112:470b-15: bden pa rnam par dpyad pa'i sbyor ba dang /
K10D0109_H0112:470b-16: sdug pa dang mi sdug pa thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i sbyor ba ste /
K10D0109_H0112:470b-18: bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sbyor ba'o //
K10D0109_H0112:470b-20: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K10D0109_H0112:470b-21: rnams kyi mi zad pa la rtog pa bcu ste
K10D0109_H0112:470b-22: / bcu gang zhe na; 'di lta ste /
K10D0109_H0112:470b-23: lus mi zad pa la rtog pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:470b-24: dngos po mi zad pa la rtog pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:470b-25: tshod mi zad pa la rtog pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:470b-26: sred pa mi zad pa la rtog pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:470b-27: lta ba mi zad pa la rtog pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:470b-28: tshogs mi zad pa la rtog pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:470b-29: nye bar len pa mi zad pa la rtog pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:470b-30: mngon par zhen pa med pa mi zad pa la rtog pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:470b-31: 'du ba mi zad pa la rtog pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:471a-1: shes pa mi zad pa la rtog pa ste /
K10D0109_H0112:471a-3: bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
K10D0109_H0112:471a-4: dpa' chen po rnams kyi mi zad pa la rtog
K10D0109_H0112:471a-6: gzhan yang bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
K10D0109_H0112:471a-7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dul ba'i dngos
K10D0109_H0112:471a-8: po ste / bcu gang zhe na /
K10D0109_H0112:471a-10: gtong ba'i char rab tu 'bebs pas ser sna'i sems 'dul ba nyid dang /
K10D0109_H0112:471a-11: las rnam gsum yongs su sbyong bas 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi sems 'dul ba nyid dang /
K10D0109_H0112:471a-12: byams pa sgom pas khong khro ba'i sems 'dul ba nyid dang /
K10D0109_H0112:471a-13: sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su btsal ba la mi skyo bas le lo'i sems 'dul ba nyid dang /
K10D0109_H0112:471a-14: bsam gtan dang rnam par thar par rnam par 'phrul pas mi dge ba'i sems 'dul ba nyid dang /
K10D0109_H0112:471a-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gtan la
K10D0109_H0112:471a-16: 'bebs pa la mkhas pa'i tshogs gsog pas mi shes
K10D0109_H0112:471a-18: lam gyi tshogs bskyed pas nyon mongs pa 'dul ba nyid dang /
K10D0109_H0112:471a-19: phyin ci ma log pa'i lam bskyed pas bden pa'i tshogs gsog pas 'dul ba nyid dang /
K10D0109_H0112:471a-20: dus dang dus ma yin par dbang sgyur bas sems 'dul ba nyid dang /
K10D0109_H0112:471a-21: bdag med pa'i chos la rtogs pas bdag 'dul ba nyid de /
K10D0109_H0112:471b-0: bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems @471b dpa'
K10D0109_H0112:471b-1: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dul ba'i dngos po'o
K10D0109_H0112:471b-3: gzhan yang bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
K10D0109_H0112:471b-4: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dul ba'i sa
K10D0109_H0112:471b-7: lus kyi las mi dge ba rnam pa gsum yongs su spong bas lus dul ba nyid dang /
K10D0109_H0112:471b-8: ngag gi las rnam pa bzhi yongs su spong bas ngag dul ba nyid dang /
K10D0109_H0112:471b-9: yid kyi nyas par spyod pa rnam pa gsum yongs su spong bas sems dul ba nyid dang /
K10D0109_H0112:471b-10: rang gi lus la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i tshul gyis nang dul ba nyid dang /
K10D0109_H0112:471b-11: chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i
K10D0109_H0112:471b-12: tshul gyis phyi rol gyi yul dul ba nyid dang
K10D0109_H0112:471b-13: / lam la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i tshul
K10D0109_H0112:471b-14: gyis ye shes kyi tshogs la mngon par zhen pa
K10D0109_H0112:471b-15: med pa dul ba nyid dang /
K10D0109_H0112:471b-16: 'phags pa'i sa'i ngo bo nyid la rtog pa'i tshul gyis bdag la bstod pa dul ba nyid dang /
K10D0109_H0112:471b-17: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
K10D0109_H0112:471b-18: pa'i tshul gyis phyi ma'i mtha' rnam par dag pa
K10D0109_H0112:471b-19: yongs su sbyong ba dul ba nyid dang /
K10D0109_H0112:471b-20: sems can thams cad la mi slu ba'i tshul gyis
K10D0109_H0112:471b-21: tha snyad shin tu yongs su dul ba nyid dang
K10D0109_H0112:471b-22: / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed
K10D0109_H0112:471b-23: pa'i snying rje chen po'i tshul gyis lus dang sems
K10D0109_H0112:471b-24: la mi lta ba dul ba nyid de /
K10D0109_H0112:472a-0: bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams @472a *//
K10D0109_H0112:472a-3: gzhan yang byang chub ni sgrub pa snying por byed
K10D0109_H0112:472a-4: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
K10D0109_H0112:472a-5: kyi yin te / log par sgrub pa snying por byed pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no //
K10D0109_H0112:472a-6: de la sgrub pa snying por byed pa ni ji
K10D0109_H0112:472a-7: skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa yin no
K10D0109_H0112:472a-8: // log par sgrub pa snying por byed pa ni tshigs gi dngos po kho na'o //
K10D0109_H0112:472a-9: de ni sgrub pa snying por byed pa mang ba yin gyi /
K10D0109_H0112:472a-10: log par sgrub pa snying por byed pa mang ba ni ma yin no //
K10D0109_H0112:472a-12: gzhan yang gnyis po 'di dag ni byang chub sems

K10D0109_H0112:472b-3: rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i shes pas sgrub pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:472b-4: lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis sgrub pa ste /
K10D0109_H0112:472b-6: gnyis po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa'o //
K10D0109_H0112:472b-8: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa gnyis te /
K10D0109_H0112:472b-11: sa rnam par gzhag pa la mkhas par sgrub pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:472b-12: sa dbyer med pa la mkhas par sgrub pa ste /
K10D0109_H0112:472b-14: gnyis po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa'o //

K10D0109_H0112:472b-19: sa'i nyes pa rnam par spong ba'i sgrub pa dang /

K10D0109_H0112:472b-28: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa bstan pa'i sgrub pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:473a-0: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las phyir mi @473a *//
K10D0109_H0112:473a-1: ldog pa la mkhas pa'i sgrub pa ste /
K10D0109_H0112:473a-3: gnyis po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa'o //
K10D0109_H0112:473a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgrub pa ni 'di lta bu 'di dag ste /
K10D0109_H0112:473a-6: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis 'bad par bya'o //
K10D0109_H0112:473a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar
K10D0109_H0112:473a-9: sgrub pa rnams la bla na med pa yang dag
K10D0109_H0112:473a-10: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed dka' ba ma yin
K10D0109_H0112:473a-11: no // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon gyur pa la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0109_H0112:473a-12: 'jam dpal khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par bshad pa legs so //
K10D0109_H0112:473a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10D0109_H0112:473a-15: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10D0109_H0112:473a-19: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K10D0109_H0112:473a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10D0109_H0112:473a-21: 'phags pa ga y'a mgo'i ri zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10D0109_H0112:473a-22: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su rendra bo dhi dang /
